title: Lemon squares
ingredients: ['For the base', '200g (7 oz) plain flour', '75g (3 oz) icing sugar', '175g (6 oz) butter, softened', 'For the lemon filling', '3 eggs', '300g (11 oz) caster sugar', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '5 tablespoons icing sugar for decoration']
